acknowledge.name: Acknowledge
acknowledge.description: Checks if users response is confirmative or not

calculate.name: Calculate
calculate.description: Allows robin to do simple calculations. Add, substract, multiply and divide

disappoint.name: Disappoint
disappoint.description: Lets the user know that Robin didn't understand your input

hello.name: Hello
hello.description: Allowed Robin to respond to hello and goodbye

info.name: Info
info.description: Provides you with basic information about Robin. IP Address, version, name and language

repeat.name: Repeat
repeat.description: Repeats the last command that Robin executed

selfie.name: Selfie
selfie.description: Lets you take a nice picture of yourself

timedate.name: Timedate
timedate.description: Let's you ask Robin for the current time or date

timer.name: Timer
timer.description: Set a countdown timer for x number of time

pushbullet.name: Pushbullet
pushbullet.description: Pushes stuff over to your phone/desktop with the pushbullet API
